title: Manage Pipeline Crossing Agreement
description: A land manager handles a request from a utility company that wants to build a new water pipeline that will cross an existing oil pipeline.

tasks.description: Receive the crossing request and the utility company's engineering designs.
tasks.expected_outcome: The request and design documents are logged.

tasks.description: Review the design to ensure it meets the pipeline company's safety standards for crossings (e.g., minimum separation).
tasks.expected_outcome: The review confirms the design is compliant with safety standards.

tasks.description: Draft a formal crossing agreement that specifies the legal and technical requirements for the construction and then send it for execution.
tasks.expected_outcome: A legal crossing agreement is drafted and sent to the utility company.
